# Reptilians
They can eat raw meat and drink blood without any ill effects. They prefer a somewhat higher temperature range than humans. They can drag objects with their tail, keeping both their hands free.
Their unarmed claw attacks deal Slash damage instead of Blunt.
They take [color=#ffa500]30% more Cold damage.[/color]
## Lore
Hailing from the planet Moghes, the Reptillian species, also known as the Unath, were the first which human's encountered in their transition to the stars. An important part of many of their cultures seems to be the process of hunting and gathering, which in recent is often expressed via frequent hunting trips to far off worlds.
